org.apache.beam.sdk.util

Interface DoFnRunner<InputT,OutputT>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoFnRunnerBase, LateDataDroppingDoFnRunner, PushbackSideInputDoFnRunner, SimpleDoFnRunner

    public interface DoFnRunner<InputT,OutputT>
    An wrapper interface that represents the execution of a DoFn.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  DoFnRunner.ReduceFnExecutor<K,InputT,OutputT,W>
      An internal interface for signaling that a DoFn requires late data dropping.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void finishBundle()
      Calls DoFn.finishBundle(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.Context) and performs additional tasks, such as flushing in-memory states.
      void processElement(WindowedValue<InputT> elem)
      Calls DoFn.processElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.ProcessContext) with a DoFn.ProcessContext containing the current element.
      void startBundle()
      Prepares and calls DoFn.startBundle(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.Context).

    • Method Detail

      • startBundle

        void startBundle()
        Prepares and calls DoFn.startBundle(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.Context).

      • processElement

        void processElement(WindowedValue<InputT> elem)
        Calls DoFn.processElement(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.ProcessContext) with a DoFn.ProcessContext containing the current element.

      • finishBundle

        void finishBundle()
        Calls DoFn.finishBundle(org.apache.beam.sdk.transforms.DoFn<InputT, OutputT>.Context) and performs additional tasks, such as flushing in-memory states.
